Class ShapeComponent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              ShapeComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, RegionInterface
public class ShapeComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements RegionInterface

Class ShapeCanvas: holds shapes in a custom drawn area and handles a region selection
Copyright Georgia Institute of Technology 2007

See Also:
